name: MSC_MIND2017
title: Midnight Scan Club data for Dartmouth MIND 2017
description:
A subset of the Midnight Scan Club (MSC) dataset, formatted 
                 for functional connectivity tutorial at the Dartmouth MIND
                 summer school, 2017. The full dataset is available at openfMRI
                 (https://openfmri.org/dataset/ds000224/). This dataset accompanies tutorial by
                 C. Gratton, available through github
                 (https://github.com/cgratton/DartmouthMIND_tutorial.git).
author: Caterina Gratton

licenses.name: ODC-PDDL-1.0
licenses.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License v1.0
